title: 'Wrong Size'
body: 'Product in nice but Wrong size received'

title: 'Okok product'
body: Quality isn't that great but pretty for the cost

title: 'No Inner Lining | Only Hand wash'
body: 'I did not like it because there is No Inner Lining | Only Hand wash'

title: 'Perfect flare'
body: It doesn't stick to your body, it has a good flare. Colour is also perfect as shown

title: 'Not worth money'
body: The fit and pleats are perfect. Elastic is also good but it's just a thin creap material without any lining. Will stick to legs due to static charge buildup with friction with hair. Returning

title: 'Elegant and stylish'
column5: v good fabric quality and pleats are very well done.perfect for casual and office look go for it'
